annotation.TEXT:
Side note about the Hiatus: Sorry to everyone who's sent me mail haven't gotten a response through the past (couple of) month(s)... I'll be going through it as much as I can, but unless you sent something really recently, don't expect a reply unless you said something really important. :<
I really don't like ignoring mail, but after the hiatus it really piled up and it's gotten to be overwhelming. I'll be a lot better about replying to mail I get from here on out.
